name: Unojo temple
description:
Game was made for LD41

 --Story--
This game combines the mechanics of twin stick shooter & platformer.

You play as a brave little hero who went to an ancient temple to stop a mad doomsday machine, with the help of his old infinite revolver.

--Controls--
* Movement: WASD
* Gun: Arrow keys
* Jump: Space bar

--Authors--
* Korteh: graphics, sfx, code, design
* Omicron: graphics, music, testing
